parameters.responseBody:
={
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Luvlang production marketing campaign completed successfully",
  "campaign_id": "{{ $json.campaign_id }}",
  "timestamp": "{{ $json.timestamp }}",
  "workflow_status": "{{ $json.workflow_status }}",
  "final_status": "{{ $json.final_status }}",
  "environment": "production",
  "daily_schedule": "{{ $json.schedule }}",
  "daily_executions": {{ $json.daily_executions }},
  "estimated_reach": {{ $json.estimated_reach }},
  "estimated_engagement": {{ $json.estimated_engagement }},
  "estimated_conversions": {{ $json.estimated_conversions }},
  "webhook_url": "{{ $json.webhook_url }}",
  "confirmation": "Production workflow active - 4x daily auto-execution + manual trigger available"
}
